div.p: A Knot Untied: OR, ALLEGIANCE Sworn to the KING, No breach of ALLEGIANCE Due unto GOD: Written at the request, and for the private satisfaction of some friends: but now made publick for the benefit of all such, who (in tenderness of Conscience towards God) scruple the taking of the said Oath.
div.q: I say the truth in Christ, I lie not, my conscience also bearing me witness in the Holy Ghost, Rom. 9.1.
